26#ifndef VICUS_DatabaseH
27#define VICUS_DatabaseH

29#include <map>

38namespace VICUS {
39
56template<typename T>
57class Database {
58public:
59 Database(unsigned int userIDSpaceStart) :
60 USER_ID_SPACE_START(userIDSpaceStart), m_userIdCounter(userIDSpaceStart)
61 {
62 }
63
65 const T * operator[](unsigned int id) const {
66 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.find(id);
67 if (it == m_data.end()) return nullptr;
68 else return &(it->second);
69 }
70
72 T * operator[](unsigned int id) {
73 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::iterator it = m_data.find(id);
74 if (it == m_data.end()) return nullptr;
75 else return &(it->second);
76 }
77
82 const T * findEqual(const T & elem) const {
83 for (typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.begin(); it != m_data.end(); ++it) {
84 const T * elemPtr = &(it->second);
85 // Note: we compare relatively strict here, and so two DB definitions are considered
86 // "different", even if only meta data like the displayname differs.
87 // The user must cleanup/merge such DB elements afterwards with the "remove duplicates" feature.
88 if (elem.equal(elemPtr) == VICUS::AbstractDBElement::Equal)
89 return elemPtr;
90 }
91 return nullptr;
92 }
93
95 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator begin() const { return m_data.begin(); }
97 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator end() const { return m_data.end(); }
99 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::iterator begin() { return m_data.begin(); }
101 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::iterator end() { return m_data.end(); }
103 size_t size() const { return m_data.size(); }
105 bool empty() const { return m_data.empty(); }
106
110 void setData(const std::vector<T> & data) {
111 m_data.clear();
112 for (const T & t : data)
113 m_data[t.m_id] = t;
114 }
115
120 void import(const Database<T> & other) {
121 FUNCID(Database::import);
122 for (typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = other.begin(); it != other.end(); ++it) {
123 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator this_it = m_data.find(it->first);
124 if (this_it != m_data.end()) {
125 IBK::IBK_Message(IBK::FormatString("DB element with duplicate ID #%1 was not imported.").arg(it->first), IBK::MSG_WARNING, FUNC_ID, IBK::VL_STANDARD);
126 continue;
127 }
128 m_data[it->first] = it->second;
129 }
130 }
131
139 unsigned int add(T & newData, unsigned int suggestedId = 0) {
140 // check if suggestedId is already used
141 bool used = false;
142 if (suggestedId != 0) {
143 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.find(suggestedId);
144 if (it != m_data.end())
145 used = true;
146 }
147 // if used, or suggestedId == 0 (new object), find first unused user-space ID
148 if (suggestedId == 0 || used) {
149 // object gets new unique Id, search for next free userId
150 unsigned int newId = ++m_userIdCounter;
151 while (m_data.find(newId) != m_data.end())
152 newId = ++m_userIdCounter;
153 newData.m_id = newId;
154 }
155 else {
156 // object gets suggested Id
157 if (newData.m_id != suggestedId) {
158 newData.m_id = suggestedId; // this should be the case already, but just to be certain
159 }
160 }
161 // set built-in flag to identify material as built-in or user-defined base on UI space
162 newData.m_builtIn = false;
163 newData.m_local = true;
164 newData.m_isReferenced = false;
165 m_data[newData.m_id] = newData;
166 // for now database is always modified when data is set, callers have to ensure that
167 // they don't re-set data with original data and id
168 m_modified = true;
169 return newData.m_id;
170 }
171
175 void remove(unsigned int id) {
176 FUNCID(Database::remove);
177 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.find(id);
178 if (it == m_data.end())
179 throw IBK::Exception( IBK::FormatString("Error removing database element with id=%1. No such ID in database.").arg(id), FUNC_ID);
180 m_data.erase(it);
181 m_modified = true;
182 }
183
185 void removeUserElements() {
186 // iterate over all elements - mind: no increment of the iterator needed here!
187 for (typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.begin(); it != m_data.end(); /* no increment here */) {
188 if (it->second.m_builtIn || it->second.m_local)
189 ++it;
190 else
191 it = m_data.erase(it); // remove it, and set it to next following element iterator
192 }
193 }
194
196 void removeLocalElements() {
197 // iterate over all elements - mind: no increment of the iterator needed here!
198 for (typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.begin(); it != m_data.end(); /* no increment here */) {
199 if (it->second.m_local && !it->second.m_builtIn)
200 it = m_data.erase(it); // remove it, and set it to next following element iterator
201 else
202 ++it;
203 }
204 }
205
207 void removeNotReferencedLocalElements() {
208 // iterate over all elements - mind: no increment of the iterator needed here!
209 for (typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::const_iterator it = m_data.begin(); it != m_data.end(); /* no increment here */) {
210 if (!it->second.m_isReferenced && it->second.m_local && !it->second.m_builtIn)
211 it = m_data.erase(it); // remove it, and set it to next following element iterator
212 else
213 ++it;
214 }
215 }
216
218 void clearChildren() {
219 for (auto it=m_data.begin(); it!=m_data.end(); ++it)
220 it->second.m_childrenRefs.clear();
221 }
222
232 void readXML(const IBK::Path & fname, const std::string & topLevelTag,
233 const std::string & childTagName,
234 bool builtIn = false)
235 {
236 FUNCID(Datbase::readXML);
237
238 TiXmlDocument doc;
239 if (!fname.isFile() )
240 return;
241
242 try {
243 if (!doc.LoadFile(fname.str().c_str(), TIXML_ENCODING_UTF8)) {
244 throw IBK::Exception(IBK::FormatString("Error in line %1 of XML file '%2':\n%3")
245 .arg(doc.ErrorRow())
246 .arg(fname)
247 .arg(doc.ErrorDesc()), FUNC_ID);
248 }
249
250 // we use a handle so that NULL pointer checks are done during the query functions
251 TiXmlHandle xmlHandleDoc(&doc);
252
253 // read root element
254 TiXmlElement * xmlElem = xmlHandleDoc.FirstChildElement().Element();
255 if (!xmlElem)
256 return; // empty file?
257 std::string rootnode = xmlElem->Value();
258 if (rootnode != topLevelTag)
259 throw IBK::Exception( IBK::FormatString("Expected '%1' as root node in XML file.")
260 .arg(topLevelTag), FUNC_ID);
261
262 const TiXmlElement * c2 = xmlElem->FirstChildElement();
263 while (c2) {
264 const std::string & c2Name = c2->ValueStr();
265 if (c2Name != childTagName)
266 IBK::IBK_Message(IBK::FormatString("Unknown/unsupported tag '%1' in line %2, expected '%3'.")
267 .arg(c2Name).arg(c2->Row()).arg(childTagName), IBK::MSG_WARNING, FUNC_ID, IBK::VL_STANDARD);
268 T obj;
269 obj.readXML(c2);
270 obj.m_builtIn = builtIn;
271 obj.m_local = false; // objects we read from the DB are not local by definition
272
273 c2 = c2->NextSiblingElement();
274
275 // Check for existing DB element with same ID, if both are built-in or both are user DB (not build-in), this raises an exception
276 // If there is no element with this id yet OR if this is a built-in element: we store the element
277 typename std::map<unsigned int, T>::iterator it = m_data.find(obj.m_id);
278 if (it == m_data.end() || obj.m_builtIn )
279 m_data[obj.m_id] = obj;
280 else if (it->second.m_builtIn && obj.m_builtIn)
281 throw IBK::Exception(IBK::FormatString("Build-In database '%1' contains duplicate ids %2 ")
282 .arg(fname.str()).arg(obj.m_id), FUNC_ID);
283 else if (!it->second.m_builtIn && !obj.m_builtIn)
284 throw IBK::Exception(IBK::FormatString("User database '%1' contains duplicate ids %2 ")
285 .arg(fname.str()).arg(obj.m_id), FUNC_ID);
286
287 }
288 }
289 catch (IBK::Exception & ex) {
290 ex.writeMsgStackToError();
291 IBK::IBK_Message(IBK::FormatString("Error reading XML database '%1'.").arg(fname), IBK::MSG_ERROR, FUNC_ID);
292 }
293 }
294
295
303 void writeXML(const IBK::Path & fname, const std::string & topLevelTag) const {
304 TiXmlDocument doc;
305 TiXmlDeclaration * decl = new TiXmlDeclaration( "1.0", "UTF-8", "" );
306 doc.LinkEndChild( decl );
307
308 TiXmlElement * root = new TiXmlElement( topLevelTag );
309 doc.LinkEndChild(root);
310
311 for (auto e : m_data)
312 if (!e.second.m_builtIn && !e.second.m_local)
313 e.second.writeXML(root);
314
315 doc.SaveFile( fname.c_str() );
316 }
317
321 bool m_modified = false;
322
323private:
325 std::map<unsigned int, T> m_data;
326
328 unsigned int USER_ID_SPACE_START;
330 unsigned int m_userIdCounter;
331};
332
333
334} // namespace VICUS

337#endif // VICUS_DatabaseH
